name: Lab Escape (Rudá Moreira, Rachel Freire)
description:
Lab Escape is a science-based educational game demo. A puzzle game in which you have to escape from a destroyed factory rooms.

You control a hazmat scientist with a merge-chemicals-and-alchemy-materials gun! 

Your goal is to escape the factory with crafting and physics-chemistry reactions!

The mechanics are crafting brain teasers reactions - with pretty cool obstacles to blast away, to give you a hint.  Take your time. Keyboard and mouse controls. you shot with ctrl pressed together with mouse button.

The game was made for an university class semester's project. In which:
Igor Felipe programmed it all
Rudá Moreira designed all levels and was the producer and scrum master
Rachel Freire designed all levels and made arts  

We hope you enjoy it!

FEATURES
  • Escape Room Puzzles!
  • Top down shooter!
  • Science!
  • Craft your inventory items!
